---
title: "Quiz 1"
---

Welcome to the first quiz to test your knowledge after week 1 of the R coding club!

**NOTE: To use the widgets in the compiled HTML file, you need to have a JavaScript-enabled browser.**

## Questions

-   What is **not** an advantage of using R: `r mcq(c("Reproducibility", "Coding", answer="Point-and-click software"))`
-   How do you call the window in R Studio where your code is carried out? `r mcq(c("Script", "Environment", "Viewer", answer="Console"))`
-   How do you open the help file for a function? `r mcq(c(answer="?functionname()", "help functionname", "functionname()", "functionname help?"))`
-   How do you load the tidyverse package? `r fitb(c("library( tidyverse )", "library( \"tidyverse\" )", "library( 'tidyverse' )"), ignore_ws = TRUE, width = "20")`
-   What is **not** a way to inspect your data? `r mcq(c("glimpse(dataframe)", answer="see(dataframe)", "View(dataframe)", "summary(dataframe)"))`
